channel.title: encrypt on Just a Memo
channel.description: Recent content in encrypt on Just a Memo

item.title: Encrypt Filesystem / 加密文件系统
item.description: Dm-crypt 加密文件系统镜像 数据包准备 安装 root# emerge -avq sys-fs/lvm2 root# emerge -avq sys-fs/cryptsetup 检查dm-crpyt是否已经加载 $ ls -l /dev/mapper/control # 接下来加载dm-crypt内核模块： $ sudo modprobe dm-crypt # dm

item.title: 密码生成程序
item.description: Gentoo Wiki 密码生成 Command ranpwd 随机生成密码 mkpasswd 随机生成密码

item.title: GPG
item.description: GPG setup .bashrc GPG_TTY=$(tty) export GPG_TTY import public key gpg --import sone.bin check finger print gpg --fingerprint .vimrc Plugin 'jamessan/vim-gnupg' generate keys gpg --full-generate-key Use GPG encrypt file with recipient gpg --output doc.gpg --encrypt --recipient blake@cyb.org doc encrypt file with password gpg -c doc decrypt file gpg --output doc --decrypt doc.gpg

item.title: Encrypt
item.description: Encrypt a partiton with dm-crypt Reference Gentoo dm-crypt wiki Encrypt files with Gnupg
